videoUrls.title: Video URLs
videoUrls.description: List of YouTube or Rumble video URLs to process

watchTimePercentage.title: Watch Time Percentage
watchTimePercentage.description: Percentage of video to watch (1-100). Actual watch time depends on the selfbot API's ability to determine video duration or a fallback.

useProxies.title: Use Apify Proxies
useProxies.description: Whether to use Apify proxy service. The selfbot APIs will be configured with the proxy.

proxyGroups.title: Proxy Groups
proxyGroups.description: Proxy groups to use if Apify Proxies are enabled.

proxyCountry.title: Proxy Country
proxyCountry.description: Country code for proxies (e.g., 'US', 'GB'). Empty or 'ANY' for any.

headless.title: Headless Mode
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode (as supported by selfbot APIs)

autoSkipAds.title: Auto Skip Ads
autoSkipAds.description: Automatically skip advertisements (relies on selfbot API capability)

skipAdsAfter.title: Skip Ads After (seconds range)
skipAdsAfter.description: Range of seconds [min, max] to wait before skipping video ads if autoSkipAds is true. Example: [5, 10]

useAV1.title: Use AV1 Codec
useAV1.description: Attempt to use AV1 video codec if available (selfbot API option)

timeout.title: Operation Timeout (seconds)
timeout.description: General timeout for operations within the selfbot APIs (e.g., page load, bot launch)

concurrencyInterval.title: Interval Between Videos (seconds)
concurrencyInterval.description: Seconds to wait between processing each video if multiple URLs are provided (sequential processing in the new main.js)

searchKeywordsForEachVideo.title: Search Keywords (for future 'search' type)
searchKeywordsForEachVideo.description: Keywords to use if a 'search' watchType is implemented with selfbot APIs. Currently, the provided main.js primarily uses 'direct' with selfbot APIs.
